column5: Roll out of bed and onto the University of North Texas campus — you can’t get any closer than this! Located in the heart of Denton you can see all of fry street and its nightlife from your patio. There are over 50 bars within walking distance, live music everywhere and the famous town square just a five minute walk up the road. Private bedroom, bathroom and closet space. Amenities include swimming pool with sun deck, 24 hour fitness center, 24 hour computer lab, and rec center with arcade games.
column8: UNT Apartment walk to Fry St or Denton Square
